titleInfo.title: Exterior of Bernheim Woman's Outfitters After the Pueblo Flood

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photographic postcard), 4 x 6 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On front of postcard: ''200 Blk. N. Main. June 3 1921 Pueblo Colo.'' On back of photocard: ''Mrs. Isidore Bernheim Ocate New Mexico Bernheim Woman's Outfitters Main St. Pueblo, Co. after the Pueblo flood 1921''. On envelope: ''#1048 Bernheim/Bowman Family Businesses, Pueblo, Co. 1921''.

mods.abstract: Damage at Charles Bernheim's Woman's Outfitters resulting from the 1921 flood in Pueblo, Colorado. The store is shown with an overturned trolley in front of it. The store was located in the 200 block of North Main in Pueblo, Colorado.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
